popupAnnouncement.ctaText: Discover MetaMask Portfolio today. Track and manage your web3 assets in one place!

seo.pageDescription: MetaMask Institutional FAQs: Discover Features, Setup Processes, and Asset Management Tips.

childMarkdownRemark.html: Answers to commonly asked questions

modules.question: How does MetaMask Institutional (MMI) differ from MetaMask?

childMarkdownRemark.html: MMI differs from MetaMask because it offers institution-required digital asset custody integrations alongside monitoring and reporting tools on the portfolio dashboard.

modules.question: Which networks does MetaMask Institutional support?

childMarkdownRemark.html: Similar to MetaMask, MMI supports all EVM chains. As a caveat, custodial account chain support is in part determined by the custodian you choose to work with. In January 2022, MMI launched custodian account multi-chain capabilitiesunlocking custodian account access to all EVM-compatible L2s and sidechains, which means MMI supports custodians in being able to have multi-chain access.

modules.question: Which tokens does MetaMask Institutional support?

childMarkdownRemark.html: MMI supports ERC-20, ERC-721, and ERC-1155 token types, just as MetaMask does. However, access to specific tokens are determined by your custodians token support framework.

modules.question: Is there a minimum AUM requirement to use MetaMask Institutional?

childMarkdownRemark.html: We have no minimum AUM requirement to use MMI. There might be qualifying criteria or considerations that are Custody partner specific. We strive to serve every organization on the planet as they make their foray to Web3.

modules.question: How do I get started with MetaMask Institutional?

childMarkdownRemark.html: To get started, request access and, if needed, schedule a time with one of our sales team members by contacting us at mmi_sales@consensys.net. You can also download the brochure for more information.

modules.question: Which custodians is MetaMask Institutional integrated with today?

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Presently, MetaMask Institutional has partnered with the following custodians:

  • BitGo
  • Cactus Custody
  • Cobo
  • Fireblocks
  • GK8
  • Hex Trust
  • Liminal
  • MPCVault
  • Propine
  • Safe

modules.question: Can I use MetaMask Institutional without working with a custodian?

childMarkdownRemark.html: Yes, you have the option to use MetaMask Institutional (MMI) in a self-hosted manner and with hardware wallets supported by MetaMask. Onboarding with a custodian partner is optional.

modules.question: Does MetaMask Institutional work with DAOs?

childMarkdownRemark.html: Yes. Many custodians are able to support DAOs. In addition, MMI has recently announced a partnership with Safe, a popular option for DAOs.

modules.question: How much does MetaMask Institutional cost?

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Metamask Institutional has a standard monthly subscription fee based on the average monthly valuation of assets deployed onchain using MMI.

Please request access to find out more.

Further cost structures are determined by the custodian you choose to work. We recommend working directly with your custodian to determine these costs.

modules.question: How long does it take to onboard from start to finish?

childMarkdownRemark.html: Onboarding with MMI typically takes a few business days. The time frame is in part determined by the custodian you choose to work with. Your custodian might have separate onboarding processes that may need to be completed before they can activate your access.

modules.question: How do I connect my custodian account?

childMarkdownRemark.html: Within your custodians platform/interface there will be a simple button to connect your custodian account with MMI. You can then select from the list of wallets you have created in your custodian account within MMI.

modules.question: How does MMI support Centralized Exchange Data support?

childMarkdownRemark.html: We work with MeshConnect to allow users to connect their Prime accounts. A user only needs their API keys and relevant password and secrets (available from your Centralized Exchange account). Account balances are brought into the token section of the portfolio dashboard.

modules.question: Are Centralized Exchange Data balances added to snapshots?

childMarkdownRemark.html: Yes, snapshot valuations will include positions held on connected Centralized Exchange Accounts.

modules.question: How does MetaMask Institutional work with my fund administrator, auditor, and tax consultant?

childMarkdownRemark.html: MMI offers Portfolio Snapshots that generates a read-only view of your organizations holdings and transactions over a given timeframe. You can download the snapshot data from the dashboard into a .csv file or share a link with fund admins, LPs, or other third-parties to highlight valuation and transaction history. All historical on chain transactions since inception can also be downloaded in csv file from the Transaction Snapshots feature.

modules.question: Does MetaMask Institutional do any P&L calculations especially for DeFi positions?

childMarkdownRemark.html: Yes this is now available with the Portfolio Dashboard home screen. You can choose to view P&L or performance attribution for your DeFi positions.

modules.question: How does Swaps in MetaMask Institutional differ from UniSwap or 1Inch?

childMarkdownRemark.html: MetaMask Swaps sources liquidity from the widest sources in the market, including Uniswap, AirSwap, 0x API, 1inch.exchange, Paraswap, and dex.ag. We aim to provide the best quote in the market at all times, and we implement technical innovations to severely limit failure rates.

modules.question: Can multiple users transact on the same wallet?

childMarkdownRemark.html: Yes, MMI allows organizations to filter and connect any account in the wallet from their custodian. This means users on different browser extensions can access the same wallets and accounts within.

modules.question: How are my transactions sent to Mainnet?

childMarkdownRemark.html: After a transaction is confirmed in the extension, transaction details are sent to the custodian, where it can be approved and signed. The transaction is then broadcast to Mainnet from the custodian account.

modules.question: How do I receive transaction status updates from MMI?

childMarkdownRemark.html: The MMI SDK receives status updates from the custodian via a webhook so that transaction status and transaction activity are updated within the extension.

modules.question: Will all my token holdings in my custody account be reflected within my MetaMask Institutional wallet?

childMarkdownRemark.html: MMI reflects all on-chain transactions, including the tokens of those transactions, within the wallet. You may need to Import token contracts into your MMI wallet.

modules.question: Will all my token holdings in my custody account be reflected within my MetaMask wallet?

childMarkdownRemark.html: MMI reflects all on-chain transactions, including the tokens of those transactions, within the wallet.

modules.question: Does MetaMask Institutional provide any insurance coverage in the case of private keys being compromised or hacked?

childMarkdownRemark.html: MMI does not hold any private keys on behalf of the customer. Private key management is done at the custodian level, hence the custodian you choose to work with is responsible for private key security and recovery. Different custodians have different recovery protocols and insurance policies, best to check with your chosen custodian.

modules.question: Who can I contact if I experience any issues?

childMarkdownRemark.html: Our Customer Support team consists of experienced technical support engineers combined with a self-service online helpdesk platform that provides the current status and full history of each support request. Please refer to the customer support language outlined in the Subscription agreement.

modules.question: How is the average monthly valuation of assets in MetaMask Institutional wallets determined?

childMarkdownRemark.html: The average monthly valuation is only applicable to the vaults or accounts where MMI has been used to deploy assets on chain. The average monthly valuation is calculated by valuing all assets held within an MMI wallet, including, but not limited to, the dollar value of any token assets, NFT dollar floor prices, dollar value of any DeFi assets (less the dollar value of any DeFi debts), dollar value of any rewards or other accruals, and the dollar value of ETH2 Staking positions and ETH2 staking rewards. The average monthly valuation is calculated by valuing all assets held within a MMI associated wallet on a daily basis throughout the calendar month and averaged monthly.

modules.question: What dont we charge for?

childMarkdownRemark.html: We do not charge for any wallets where MMI was not used to transact on chain. This includes any custodial accounts whether they are imported into MMI or not.

modules.question: When will this subscription be effective?

childMarkdownRemark.html: Your subscription will be effective upon checking of the box to agree to our Terms and Conditions when you complete the onboarding process with MetaMask Institutional.

modules.question: How long is this subscription for?

childMarkdownRemark.html: This agreement shall begin on the Effective Date and shall continue until terminated by either party.

modules.question: How can I cancel my subscription?

childMarkdownRemark.html: You can terminate our subscription agreement for any reason by providing at least 90 days written notice.

modules.question: When will I be billed?

childMarkdownRemark.html: Fees will be invoiced monthly. Consensys will send an invoice within 20 business days of the end of the month detailing that month. Where relevant, the MMI Fee shall be prorated based upon the number of days for which it was applicable.

modules.question: In what currency will I be charged?

childMarkdownRemark.html: All fees, costs and expenses will be payable in ETH or USDC.

modules.question: Where can I view my monthly AUD?

childMarkdownRemark.html: Our invoices will provide a breakdown of the average monthly AUD.

modules.question: How do I offboard from my existing custodian to a new custodian?

childMarkdownRemark.html: By signing up to a new custodian, creating new accounts, importing those accounts into MMI and moving all your assets from your previous custodial accounts to your new custodial accounts.

modules.question: Can I import my old custodial accounts into my new custodian?

childMarkdownRemark.html: Every custodian or custody tech provider generates keys or key shares in different ways. This means key material generated in one custodian is not necessarily importable to a new custodian. Many custodians and custody tech providers do allow you to export your private keys or key shares. Hence, providing the capability to self-custody if needed. This key material can then be used to sign transactions. However, this key material wont be able to be imported into another custodian to custody tech-provider.

modules.question: What functionalities do your APIs offer?

childMarkdownRemark.html: Our APIs provide a comprehensive suite of endpoints that support operations such as taking snapshots, generating transaction histories, and retrieving profit and loss (P&L) along with performance data for accounts on Ethereum and Solana. We prioritize high reliability and performance, delivering minimal latency and maintaining a robust uptime of 99.99% to ensure uninterrupted service.

modules.question: What is the pricing for your API services?

childMarkdownRemark.html: Our base tier is available at a cost of $99 and can be added to your existing MMI subscription. For standalone use of our APIs with enhanced quota limits, please contact us for more details.

modules.question: Is it possible to exceed my quota limit on API requests?

childMarkdownRemark.html: Yes, you can exceed the defined quota. We apply an overage fee for any requests that surpass your quota limit. Please contact us for more details.

modules.question: How and when am I billed for the API usage?

childMarkdownRemark.html: Billing occurs at the end of each month. We will send you an invoice that includes the total number of API requests made during the month and charges for any additional MMI services utilized.

sharedCopy.browserNotSupported: is not supported. Please download a browser that supports MetaMask.
